content.question: Using the excerpts, respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe one major difference between Billington’s and Schwantes’ historical interpretations of the American West. Briefly explain how one historical event or development from 1848 to 1898 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Billington’s interpretation. Briefly explain how one historical event or development from 1848 to 1898 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Schwantes’ interpretation.

frqParts.text: Using the excerpts, respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe one major difference between Billington’s and Schwantes’ historical interpretations of the American West. skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
